Name: Color Purification Catalyst
Description: A material needed for Alchemy that can maximize the color potential contained within raw materials.
Description$english: A material needed for Alchemy that can maximize the color potential contained within raw materials.
Description2$english: Two substances that originally do not interact will undergo a transformation upon contact with a specific medium. This change induced by a specific substance is vividly referred to as the "catalyst effect" in alchemical techniques.
